comment.author: 29056926@N02
comment._content:
Part of Toshogu in ex-Shiba ward of Tokyo City; current Minato City, Tokyo Prefecture.  

This building no longer exists.  I was told by a monk at neighborhing Zojo-ji that it was destroyed by fire in the Meiji 20s.  I wouldn't rule out the Kanto earthquake or World War 2, though.
